name: Bayo
description:
Play as a young pangolin and his mother in their escape from evil poachers, who is hunting them for their highly coveted scales. Disarm snares, solve puzzles and make your way across the great african savannah to the safety of the wildlife sanctuary.

Bayo was made around the Games for Change thematics, and centered around pangolin conservation and poaching.

Learn more here: https://www.savepangolins.org/
